Ray Eddy.action: Complies calmly with the bartender's frisk for body wires without hesitation or resistance.

Ray Eddy.action: Follows Bruno and the bartender out the back of the club without questioning or showing visible signs of doubt.

Ray Eddy.action: Drives directly to the location indicated by Lila without hesitation.

Ray Eddy.action: Agrees to take the girls despite the violent intimidation by Bruno.

Ray Eddy.action: Pulls a gun on Bruno to demand the rest of the payment.

Ray Eddy.action: Commands Bruno to open the trunk and later pulls a gun on him to demand the rest of the money.

Ray Eddy.action: Does not intervene physically when Bruno abuses the girl but instead waits and then takes control.

Ray Eddy.action: Relies on Lila to open the trunk and does not personally check the girls or the trunk himself.

Ray Eddy.action: Shoots at the pavement beside Bruno to intimidate him and secure the money.

Ray Eddy.action: Refuses Lila's offer to take the rest of the money, asserting control over the situation.

Ray Eddy.action: Waits calmly with the gun on Bruno while the bartender retrieves the money.

Ray Eddy.action: Backs into the car while still pointing the gun at Bruno, maintaining defensive posture.

Ray Eddy.action: Insists on counting the money immediately despite injury and danger.

Ray Eddy.action: Smiles and wipes away blood after the incident.

Ray Eddy.action: Stops and goes back to help one of the Chinese girls who keeps falling while running on the frozen river.
